All right, I get sick for one weekend and everything goes to hell.  Now then, 
on to what I need to say.  LN, you're first, I have been posting less 
regularly now than I would like, however I've still been posting, I've had to 
devote more time to homework right now because midterms start Wednesday, and 
I thought I'd like to pass them, just for laughs.  

       Now then, onto the restart/sequal.  I would personally, prefer a 
sequel and thus involving some already existing characters.  I also agree 
with ... um, whoever said that people need to RP better, sorry I've forgotten 
who it was because there were 62 OOC posts.

       This brings me to my third and final point.  Of the 62 posts 
approximately the first 20 were on topic.  If you're going to break into 
arguments again, well ... don't.

       Now I'm seriously considering going to bed.

--part1_113.b2f03e0.297cb456_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
